title: Carbon sinks include organic matter in deep ocean

content.question: Which of the following is an example of a carbon sink?

choices.label: Deposition of organic matter on the deep ocean floor
Clearing of trees in the Amazon forest
Combustion of fossil fuels in power plants
Decomposition of food waste by bacteria
Nutrient uptake by the roots of grasses in a suburban lawn

content.answer: Deposition of organic matter on the deep ocean floor

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
